info.brief_description: Our main character comes across a device that allows him to store and/use other parts.
info.description:
You are a college student named James during a summer break on campus. You are very aware of yourself as a man but can get curious about how the “other side” lives at times. You have a tendency to watch porn when you’re bored even though you have a great girlfriend who satisfies your every desire.

With this story, the goal is to explore James’ taboo feelings about women, their bodies, their feelings, sluttiness, etc. We will do this by introducing a computer like device that allows James to duplicate body parts from anyone and (at his discretion) substitute them for his own.

The machine has some limitations though: reality is altered with any changes to James, muscle memory stays with the parts even if bodies have been changed, very specific mental attributes can be isolated, and everyone in the world is fair game if a name is known.

Keep in mind, this is for James and his feelings toward the female sex. We should keep his transformations limited to female.
